successes.title: Point: A softer take on home security.
successes.description: Point is a smart house sitter. It listens to the sounds of your home, senses what's in the air and lets you know if anything is wrong.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU: Buy us fika (that's a Swedish coffee break). Support our mission to bring back privacy to the home security market. We'll thank you publicly on our website and give you exclusive behind the scenes updates to the project.
SUPER EARLY BIRD POINT: We made 100 Points available at a steep discount for friends, family and our earliest supporters • Free shipping
EARLY BIRD POINT: Receive one Point for your studio apartment at an early bird price • Free shipping
ONE POINT: Receive one Point for your studio apartment. Point will never be this affordable in retail. • Free shipping
THREE EARLY BIRD POINTS: Cover your whole home or split a three pack among your friends. Receive three Points for your home at an early bird price • Free shipping

ONE BETA POINT: Receive a Point before anyone else! This is bleeding edge. Don't expect the UI to be polished. You'll also get exclusive access to our API, we can't wait to see what you build. • Free shipping
THREE POINTS: Cover your whole home or split a three pack among your friends. Receive three Points • Free shipping
FIVE EARLY BIRD POINTS: Receive five Points at an early bird price for your home or office • Free shipping
FIVE POINTS: Receive five Points for your home or small office • Free shipping
TEN POINTS: The Bed and Breakfast Package, receive ten Points • Free shipping

CORPORATE PILOT PROGRAM: 
Get ten Points, exclusive access to our API and support from our engineers to implement building management for your organization or hotel.  • Free worldwide shipping
